name: Desert Spada
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Baroque Works
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.
trigger: [Trigger] Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.
